headerDescription: This is the part of the card that the person will see first. Remember that the appearance of the card can be observed on the fly as you complete the form. This section, as well as the greetings section, can be turned off, so if you feel that this section is unnecessary, you can turn it off with the switch at the top.
name: Name
isStroke: Is the outline to be made?
colorStroke: Choose a color for the outline
underName: Text under name and gif section
isFireworks: Do you want fireworks on the page?
wishesDescribe: Here you can show off your creativity by adding any of the sections available below. You can change the order of each section by dragging and dropping.
imgUrl: Add a photo using a URL
writeUrl: Enter the URL of the photo for the card
howGenerate: The button below will generate your card with wishes and a QR code
localDescription: If you encounter any problems or want to show the card immediately without generating a QR code, you can switch to local mode. It will take you to the finished card. This is a good feature if you want to show the card to a friend from your phone without creating a code or link.
errorGenerate: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later or use the local mode below.
